titles.title: For the relief of Mrs. Marie Marlow of Friendswood, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/30/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay to Marie Marlow the difference between the amount of veterans' disability benefits that her late father received and the amount that he would have received had the correct special monthly compensation rate been applied, with interest.
